name: Mauricio Meireles
body:
## Summary
I live iOS since 2009. 
I love developing apps for fun and also to enhance users life.
I teach people to do the same :-)


## Experience

### iOS Instructor @ [Instituto de Pesquisas Eldorado](http://www.eldorado.org.br)
**June 2013 – Present - Porto Alegre/RS, Brazil**

Instructor at [BEPiD](http://www.bepid.com.br/poa/Pages/Default.aspx) (Brazilian Education Program for iOS Development), a pioneering program with support from Apple. My role is to teach iOs to university students in an one year course that should prepare them to start their own startups and develop great apps.

### iOS Developer/Co-Founder @ [Beelieve](http://www.beelieve.com.br)
**August 2011 – Present - Porto Alegre/RS, Brazil**

Co-Founder of Beelieve, startup focused on iOs development. Here are some examples of Apps that we developed:
* [Pinosoccer](http://www.pinosoccerhd.com)
* [DogDate](http://www.dogdateapp.com)

More details: [www.beelieve.com.br](http://www.beelieve.com.br)

### iOS Developer @ [Grupo RBS](http://www.gruporbs.com.br/eng/index.php)
**October 2012 – May 2013 (8 months) - Porto Alegre/RS, Brazil**

Develop iOs Apps for Grupo RBS ( Brazilian media conglomerate, is one of Brazil’s largest communication groups). Follow some examples of apps that I developed, special mention to Zero Hora app for iPad/iPhone. Zero Hora is a Brazilian newspaper based in the city of Porto Alegre, the seventh biggest of the country:
* [Zero Hora](https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/zero-hora/id415470445?mt=8)
* [Gremista ZH](https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/gremista-zh/id650060491?mt=8)
* [Colorado ZH](https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/colorado-zh/id650060590?mt=8)
* [Diario Catarinense](https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/diario-catarinense/id439399352)
* [A Notícia](https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/a-noticia/id570793261?mt=8)
* [O Sol Diário](https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/o-sol-diario/id551362959?mt=8)

### Oracle EBS Consultant @ [Instituto de Pesquisas Eldorado](http://www.eldorado.org.br) (working for Dell)
**April 2011 – August 2011 (5 months) - Porto Alegre/RS, Brazil**

Oracle EBS Consultant developing enhancements and new projects at Dell.
Working with MO and a Global Environment.

### Oracle EBS Functional Consultant – P2P (PO/AP/iProcurement/iExpense) @ [HCL Tech](http://www.hcltech.com)
**September 2009 – April 2011 (1 year 8 months) - São Leopoldo/RS, Brazil**

Oracle EBS Consultant in P2P (PO/AP/iSupplier/iExpense/RI/Sourcing)

Clients:
* Renner
* Procergs
* Ricardo Eletro
* Energia Sustentável

### Software Developer @ [Dell Inc](http://www.dell.com)
**October 2005 – September 2009 (3 years 11 months) - Porto Alegre/RS, Brazil | Austin/TX - US**

I worked at US DOMS team, developing new code, maintaining the legacy and attending support level 3. I traveled several times to Austin to requirement gathering and helped on developing a new tool to facilitate the analyses the impact of a new requirement in the US DOMS modules. Rated two times as an Excellent employee, won a Bronze prize as an Individual and a Silver and a Gold prizes as a team.
